name: Stop Fire Now
description:
FIREFIGHTER: Stop Fire Now!

Logical multilevel game.
Fire is a dangerous thing, but it can be beaten.

Imagine: you are the fire chief.
You are a very big head. ;-)
You sit in front of a monitor and control the process of extinguishing the fire.
Your goal is to save the territory from fire.
On the monitor a map of the fires. It shows occupied fire areas (with each new level of the game there will be more).
To fight fire you have everything you need.
But, with each new level, the situation will become more complicated...
Your logic against the element of fire. Who will win?
Good luck!
